sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM t_security_ctlg WHERE ctlg_itm_cd in (SELECT ctlg_itm_cd_1 FROM t_security_sprtly_ctlg WHERE ctlg_cd = (select cd from t_security_code where cd_nm = #ctlg_cd# and cd like '%G%' or cd = #ctlg_cd#)) OR ctlg_itm_cd in (SELECT ctlg_itm_cd_2 FROM t_security_sprtly_ctlg WHERE ctlg_cd = (select cd from t_security_code where cd_nm = #ctlg_cd# and cd like '%G%' or cd = #ctlg_cd#)) OR ctlg_itm_cd in (SELECT ctlg_itm_cd_3 FROM t_security_sprtly_ctlg WHERE ctlg_cd = (select cd from t_security_code where cd_nm = #ctlg_cd# and cd like '%G%' or cd = #ctlg_cd#)) OR ctlg_itm_cd in (SELECT ctlg_itm_cd_4 FROM t_security_sprtly_ctlg WHERE ctlg_cd = (select cd from t_security_code where cd_nm = #ctlg_cd# and cd like '%G%' or cd = #ctlg_cd#)) OR ctlg_itm_cd in (SELECT ctlg_itm_cd_5 FROM t_security_sprtly_ctlg WHERE ctlg_cd = (select cd from t_security_code where cd_nm = #ctlg_cd# and cd like '%G%' or cd = #ctlg_cd#)) OR ctlg_itm_cd in (SELECT ctlg_itm_cd_6 FROM t_security_sprtly_ctlg WHERE ctlg_cd = (select cd from t_security_code where cd_nm = #ctlg_cd# and cd like '%G%' or cd = #ctlg_cd#)) OR ctlg_itm_cd in (SELECT ctlg_itm_cd_7 FROM t_security_sprtly_ctlg WHERE ctlg_cd = (select cd from t_security_code where cd_nm = #ctlg_cd# and cd like '%G%' or cd = #ctlg_cd#)) OR ctlg_itm_cd in (SELECT ctlg_itm_cd_8 FROM t_security_sprtly_ctlg WHERE ctlg_cd = (select cd from t_security_code where cd_nm = #ctlg_cd# and cd like '%G%' or cd = #ctlg_cd#)) OR ctlg_itm_cd in (SELECT ctlg_itm_cd_9 FROM t_security_sprtly_ctlg WHERE ctlg_cd = (select cd from t_security_code where cd_nm = #ctlg_cd# and cd like '%G%' or cd = #ctlg_cd#)) OR ctlg_itm_cd in (SELECT ctlg_itm_cd_10 FROM t_security_sprtly_ctlg WHERE ctlg_cd = (select cd from t_security_code where cd_nm = #ctlg_cd# and cd like '%G%' or cd = #ctlg_cd#)) order by prtcuse_frqc desc
sqlMap.update: update t_security_sprtly_ctlg set ctlg_itm_cd_1 = #ctlg_itm_cd_1#, ctlg_itm_cd_2 = #ctlg_itm_cd_2#, ctlg_itm_cd_3 = #ctlg_itm_cd_3#, ctlg_itm_cd_4 = #ctlg_itm_cd_4#, ctlg_itm_cd_5 = #ctlg_itm_cd_5#, ctlg_itm_cd_6 = #ctlg_itm_cd_6#, ctlg_itm_cd_7 = #ctlg_itm_cd_7#, ctlg_itm_cd_8 = #ctlg_itm_cd_8#, ctlg_itm_cd_9 = #ctlg_itm_cd_9#, ctlg_itm_cd_10 = #ctlg_itm_cd_10# WHERE ctlg_cd = (select cd from t_security_code where cd_nm = #ctlg_cd# and cd like '%G%' or cd = #ctlg_cd#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT incdt_idtf_cd, ctlg_cd, ctlg_itm_cd_1, ctlg_itm_cd_2, ctlg_itm_cd_3, ctlg_itm_cd_4, ctlg_itm_cd_5, ctlg_itm_cd_6, ctlg_itm_cd_7, ctlg_itm_cd_8, ctlg_itm_cd_9, ctlg_itm_cd_10, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg A, t_security_sprtly_ctlg B WHERE A.ctlg_cd=#findCode# AND A.ctlg_itm_cd = B.ctlg_itm_cd_1) AS ctlg_itm_cd_1_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg A, t_security_sprtly_ctlg B WHERE A.ctlg_cd=#findCode# AND A.ctlg_itm_cd = B.ctlg_itm_cd_2) AS ctlg_itm_cd_2_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg A, t_security_sprtly_ctlg B WHERE A.ctlg_cd=#findCode# AND A.ctlg_itm_cd = B.ctlg_itm_cd_3) AS ctlg_itm_cd_3_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg A, t_security_sprtly_ctlg B WHERE A.ctlg_cd=#findCode# AND A.ctlg_itm_cd = B.ctlg_itm_cd_4) AS ctlg_itm_cd_4_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg A, t_security_sprtly_ctlg B WHERE A.ctlg_cd=#findCode# AND A.ctlg_itm_cd = B.ctlg_itm_cd_5) AS ctlg_itm_cd_5_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg A, t_security_sprtly_ctlg B WHERE A.ctlg_cd=#findCode# AND A.ctlg_itm_cd = B.ctlg_itm_cd_6) AS ctlg_itm_cd_6_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg A, t_security_sprtly_ctlg B WHERE A.ctlg_cd=#findCode# AND A.ctlg_itm_cd = B.ctlg_itm_cd_7) AS ctlg_itm_cd_7_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg A, t_security_sprtly_ctlg B WHERE A.ctlg_cd=#findCode# AND A.ctlg_itm_cd = B.ctlg_itm_cd_8) AS ctlg_itm_cd_8_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg A, t_security_sprtly_ctlg B WHERE A.ctlg_cd=#findCode# AND A.ctlg_itm_cd = B.ctlg_itm_cd_9) AS ctlg_itm_cd_9_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg A, t_security_sprtly_ctlg B WHERE A.ctlg_cd=#findCode# AND A.ctlg_itm_cd = B.ctlg_itm_cd_10) AS ctlg_itm_cd_10_nm FROM t_security_sprtly_ctlg WHERE incdt_idtf_cd=#incdt_idtf_cd# AND ctlg_cd=#findCode#

SELECT incdt_idtf_cd, ctlg_cd, ctlg_itm_cd_1, ctlg_itm_cd_2, ctlg_itm_cd_3, ctlg_itm_cd_4, ctlg_itm_cd_5, ctlg_itm_cd_6, ctlg_itm_cd_7, ctlg_itm_cd_8, ctlg_itm_cd_9, ctlg_itm_cd_10, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg WHERE 1=1 AND ctlg_itm_cd = ctlg_itm_cd_1) AS ctlg_itm_cd_1_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg WHERE 1=1 AND ctlg_itm_cd = ctlg_itm_cd_2) AS ctlg_itm_cd_2_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg WHERE 1=1 AND ctlg_itm_cd = ctlg_itm_cd_3) AS ctlg_itm_cd_3_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg WHERE 1=1 AND ctlg_itm_cd = ctlg_itm_cd_4) AS ctlg_itm_cd_4_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg WHERE 1=1 AND ctlg_itm_cd = ctlg_itm_cd_5) AS ctlg_itm_cd_5_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg WHERE 1=1 AND ctlg_itm_cd = ctlg_itm_cd_6) AS ctlg_itm_cd_6_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg WHERE 1=1 AND ctlg_itm_cd = ctlg_itm_cd_7) AS ctlg_itm_cd_7_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg WHERE 1=1 AND ctlg_itm_cd = ctlg_itm_cd_8) AS ctlg_itm_cd_8_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg WHERE 1=1 AND ctlg_itm_cd = ctlg_itm_cd_9) AS ctlg_itm_cd_9_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg WHERE 1=1 AND ctlg_itm_cd = ctlg_itm_cd_10) AS ctlg_itm_cd_10_nm FROM t_security_sprtly_ctlg WHERE incdt_idtf_cd=#incdt_idtf_cd#
